name: part_002
file: tmp_【THE DEVIL WEARS HOPE 3D LIVE】 IRyS Anniversary LIVE #DevilWearsHope [RQn7biOiqHs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: IRyS performs 'Akuma no Ko' (The Devil's Child), the second ending theme of Attack on Titan: The Final Season Part 2.
IRyS begins the MC section of her 3rd Anniversary LIVE, greeting the audience in English and Japanese and discussing the live's theme and stages.

subtitles.original: 君を愛すよ
subtitles.english: I love you

subtitles.original: 何を犠牲にしても
subtitles.english: No matter what I sacrifice

subtitles.original: それでも君を守るよ
subtitles.english: I will still protect you

subtitles.original: 間違いだとしても
subtitles.english: Even if it's a mistake

subtitles.original: 疑ったりしない
subtitles.english: I won't doubt it

subtitles.original: 正しさとは自分のこと
subtitles.english: Righteousness is about yourself

subtitles.original: 強く信じることだ
subtitles.english: believing strongly.

subtitles.original: 鉄の雨が降り頻る情景
subtitles.english: A scene where iron rain falls incessantly.

subtitles.original: テレビの中、映画に見えたんだ
subtitles.english: It looked like a movie on TV.

subtitles.original: 戦争なんて愚かな凶暴
subtitles.english: War is just foolish violence.

subtitles.original: 関係ない、知らない国の話
subtitles.english: It's irrelevant, a story from an unknown country.

subtitles.original: それなら何で、あいつを憎んで
subtitles.english: Then why do I hate that person

subtitles.original: 黒い気持ち隠しきれない
subtitles.english: and can't hide these dark feelings?

subtitles.original: 訳、説明だってできやしないんだ
subtitles.english: I can't even explain the reason.

subtitles.original: 僕らはなんて矛盾ばかりなんだ
subtitles.english: How full of contradictions we are.

subtitles.original: この言葉も訳されれば
subtitles.english: If these words were translated,

subtitles.original: 本当の意味は伝わらない
subtitles.english: the true meaning wouldn't be conveyed.

subtitles.original: 信じるのは、その目を開いて
subtitles.english: What I believe in is, opening those eyes

subtitles.original: 触れた世界だけ
subtitles.english: only the world you've touched.

subtitles.original: ただただ生きるのは嫌だ
subtitles.english: I just hate living pointlessly.

subtitles.original: 世界は残酷だ
subtitles.english: The world is cruel.

subtitles.original: それでも君を愛すよ
subtitles.english: But I still love you.

subtitles.original: 何を犠牲にしても
subtitles.english: No matter what I sacrifice

subtitles.original: それでも君を愛すよ
subtitles.english: But I still love you.

subtitles.original: それでも君を守るよ
subtitles.english: I will still protect you.

subtitles.original: 選んだ人の影、捨てた者の屍
subtitles.english: The shadows of the chosen, the corpses of the discarded.

subtitles.original: 気づいたんだ自分の中
subtitles.english: I realized that inside me

subtitles.original: 育つのは悪魔の子
subtitles.english: is the child of a devil growing.

subtitles.original: 正義の裏、犠牲の中
subtitles.english: Behind justice, amidst sacrifice

subtitles.original: 心には悪魔の子
subtitles.english: there's a devil's child in the heart.

subtitles.original: Hi-RyS! It's IRyS from hololive English -Promise-.
subtitles.english: Hi-RyS! It's IRyS from hololive English -Promise-.

subtitles.original: hololive Englishのアイリスです！
subtitles.english: I'm IRyS from hololive English!

subtitles.original: Welcome to my 3rd anniversary live, "Devil Wears Hope"! Whoo!
subtitles.english: Welcome to my 3rd anniversary live, "Devil Wears Hope"! Whoo!

subtitles.original: I know it's a little late due to scheduling issues, but I'm so glad I'm finally able to do this! Yay!
subtitles.english: I know it's a little late due to scheduling issues, but I'm so glad I'm finally able to do this! Yay!

subtitles.original: えっと、ウェルカム、アイリスの、えっと、Devil Wears Hope、えっと、3周年のライブへようこそ！
subtitles.english: Um, welcome to IRyS's... um, Devil Wears Hope... um, 3rd anniversary live! Welcome!

subtitles.original: Thank you very much for coming. 来てくださりありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much for coming. Thank you for coming!

subtitles.original: Ha ha! How'd you guys like the first two songs?
subtitles.english: Ha ha! How'd you guys like the first two songs?

subtitles.original: Yes, my dear Nakaman-ko! Did you guys notice that they were held on different stages? Yeah?
subtitles.english: Yes, my dear Nakaman-ko! Did you guys notice that they were held on different stages? Yeah?

subtitles.original: 「悪魔の子」と "My Dearest"、どうでしたか？
subtitles.english: How did you like "Akuma no Ko" and "My Dearest"?

subtitles.original: 両方とも、あのなんと、別のステージで歌ってたんじゃないかなって、今頃みんな気づいてるんじゃないかな？
subtitles.english: Both were... um, actually sung on different stages. I think everyone is noticing that by now.

subtitles.original: Yeah, this—where I am right now—is the devil stage. It's very pretty and purple.
subtitles.english: Yeah, this—where I am right now—is the devil stage. It's very pretty and purple.

subtitles.original: And over there is where the beautiful angelic stage is. Yes!
subtitles.english: And over there is where the beautiful angelic stage is. Yes!

subtitles.original: I will be moving around quite a lot this live to sing many songs.
subtitles.english: I will be moving around quite a lot this live to sing many songs.

subtitles.original: And even though there's two stages, there might be even more!
subtitles.english: And even though there's two stages, there might be even more!

subtitles.original: なんとね、このあのダブルステージでお披露目させていただきます。というかダブルステージどころか、もっとあるかもしれません。
subtitles.english: Actually, I'll be performing on this double stage. Or rather, instead of just a double stage, there might be even more.

subtitles.original: 歌うところね。楽しみにしてて下さい。
subtitles.english: Places to sing, I mean. Please look forward to it.

subtitles.original: えっと、As you guys can tell by now...
subtitles.english: Um, as you guys can tell by now...

subtitles.original: the theme of this live this time is Angel and Devil theme, because there's no other theme that would fit me as perfectly as this.
subtitles.english: the theme of this live this time is Angel and Devil theme, because there's no other theme that would fit me as perfectly as this.

subtitles.original: えっと、今回のライブのテーマはなんと、天使と悪魔です！多分今頃もうみんな気づいてると思うんですけど。
subtitles.english: Um, the theme of this live is... wow, Angel and Devil! I think everyone's already noticed by now, though.

subtitles.original: アイリスはね、えっと、半分悪魔、半分天使なんでね。そちらをね、あの、もう、パーフェクトなライブになるかと思います！
subtitles.english: IRyS is, um, half-devil and half-angel. With that, I think it's going to be a perfect live!

subtitles.original: I will be singing a lot of songs with a lot of guests, and there might be a very special announcement!
subtitles.english: I will be singing a lot of songs with a lot of guests, and there might be a very special announcement!

subtitles.original: So I hope you guys look forward to that, yeah? Make sure you watch till the end.
subtitles.english: So I hope you guys look forward to that, yeah? Make sure you watch till the end.

subtitles.original: And make sure you use the hashtag #DevilWearsHope to tweet your thoughts. Thank you!
subtitles.english: And make sure you use the hashtag #DevilWearsHope to tweet your thoughts. Thank you!

subtitles.original: ぜひね、こちらの #DevilWearsHope のハッシュタグでツイート、感想をお待ちしております！ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Please, I'm waiting for your tweets and thoughts with this #DevilWearsHope hashtag! Thank you very much!
